      • createResourceRecord

        public static ResourceRecord createResourceRecord(byte[] rrecord,
                                                  byte[] message)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new ResourceRecord based on a byte array
        Parameters:
        rrecord - A byte array with the serialized RR
        message - A byte array containing the complete message
        Returns:
        A ResourceRecord of the appropriate type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case the bytes cannot be fully parsed

      • getTTL

        public final int getTTL()
        The TTL (in seconds) of the ResourceRecord. Note that this field is not updated by this class. Care must be taken to update it if it is to be stored in a cache object.
        Returns:
